short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows the user to control what kind of replies to see on Piazza

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to control what replies you see on Piazza. You can 
1) Hide all +1s.
2) View only unresolved follow ups. 
3) Hide all replies altogether
